summary:
Headline:  
AMD delivered solid Q2 2024 results with 8% revenue growth year-over-year, driven by strong demand in data center and client processor segments. Gross margins improved notably, and operating expenses were reduced, supporting profitability.

Growth & revenue drivers:  
- Revenue rose 8% YoY, primarily fueled by increased demand in data center and client processor markets.  
- No segment-level revenue breakdown provided beyond these drivers.

Margins / profitability:  
- Gross margin expanded by 120 basis points, attributed to a favorable product mix.  
- Operating expenses declined 4%, reflecting ongoing efforts to streamline headcount and marketing spend.

Guidance & outlook:  
- Raised full-year revenue guidance to mid-teens percentage growth.  
- Expect further gross margin expansion in the second half of the fiscal year.

Risks / watchpoints:  
- No specific risks or headwinds mentioned in the remarks.  
- Monitor execution on margin expansion and sustained demand in key segments.
